tldr: The `ncurses` package will no longer be maintained as declared by the developer. Multiple vulnerabilities have already been discovered. The project has been archived and cannot submit issues. The developer has recommended using the `ratatui` or `cursive` crate instead.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `ncurses` package from your application.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
